message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a great compromise between our initial offers. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $125? Can you do that?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! I can do $127, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I really want this product. Can you do $122? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $128. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
